channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 29th July
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure required 28 days please cut back overgrown hedge an vegetation and brambles back to boundary approximately 10 metres x3 metres (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 29th July
item.description:
Road closure 28 day please refresh give way markings approximately 32 600x250mm dot's plus x2. 3 meter lines (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 29th July
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AND TAKE PLEASE BRING X2 BARRIERS AND X4 SANDBAGS AND X2 FOOTWAY CLOSURE BOARDS PLACE AROUND DAMAGED RAISED BT COVER TO MAKE SAFE (Damaged Street Furniture)
